Author: Rickticia
Text: I know your future self will forgive you. They will see and understand that you were struggling. It’s not your fault. You’d say that to someone else if they were struggling; the same extends to you :) .

Author: donout_disturb
Text: You basically wrote what I tell myself every day. I'm also 17, almost 18, and I feel so miserable thinking that my future self will remember me like that.  I am throwing away the "best years of my life" beint obsessed over food, weight, how do I look.  I'm so mad at myself, food is literally the easiest thing in this world, and I made it the most complex and complicated.  The only thing that keeps me going is the hope that one day I'll get better, and this will just be a dark period of my life I overcame.  I'm sorry that I messed myself up, I feel like I fucked up my whole life and it's all my fault.   Sending love.
